CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: , pyrrolo[3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4(2H,5H)-dione unit has a well conjugated structure with strong π-π interaction and electron - withdrawing effect , some main - chain D-A copolymers based on DPP or / and BDT units as prime building block had been designed for optoelectronic applications in both thin - film transistors and solar cells in recent years.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| pyrrolo[3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4(2H,5H)-dione |
| DPP units |
| BDT units |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| pyrrolo[3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4(2H,5H)-dione |
| DPP units |
| BDT units |

These are the entities in the paragraph that can be identified as material names. The other entities such as "some main-chain D-A copolymers", "prime building block", "for optoelectronic applications in both thin-film transistors and solar cells in recent years" do not refer to specific material names.
